sourcing.instructions: - Manganese: Available at chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
steps: - Manganese: Available at chemical suppliers or online marketplaces.
1. Weigh out 12 g of manganese, 7 g of phosphorus, 1 g of terbium, and 1 g of zirconium.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 12 g of manganese, 7 g of phosphorus, 1 g of terbium, and 1 g of zirconium.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1000째C (1832째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1000째C (1832째F).

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the material to cool gradually to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the material to cool gradually to room temperature.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
